entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 2.
